moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user lets out a damaging belch on the target. The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Memento
moves.description: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.
